remarks: Closure of the Hom functor.  Note that the codomain is the category ` SetCat `` U ` for any universe ` U ` which contains each Hom-set. This corresponds to the assertion that ` C ` be locally small (with respect to ` U ` ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
statement:
hofcl.m $e |- M = ( HomF ` C ) $.
hofcl.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
hofcl.d $e |- D = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
hofcl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
hofcl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
hofcl.h $e |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ U ) $.
hofcl $p |- ( ph -> M e. ( ( O Xc. C ) Func D ) ) $.
